title: IMPORTANT DATE
description:
An IMPORTANT DATE is a milestone or a planned event which will be specialized for the different scopes of IMPORTANT DATE; e.g. IMPORTANT DATE FOR STUDY, IMPORTANT DATE FOR STUDY COUNTRY, IMPORTANT DATE FOR STUDY SITE., ....
An IMPORTANT DATE is typificated by IMPORTANT DATE TYPE.

actualDate.title: actualDate
actualDate.description: The actual date the important date got effective / valid

plannedDate.title: plannedDate
plannedDate.description: The date the important date is planned to go valid.

typeCode.title: importantDateType.code
typeCode.description: Provides the code of important date type

typeName.title: importantDateType.term
typeName.description: provides the term of the important date type

typeStatusDescription.title: importantDateType.statusDescription
typeStatusDescription.description: For some important date types a study / study country / study site will get into the status named in status description when an important date (associated to the study / study country / study site) is actually reached.
